sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Action) The character may take the Scathing Tirade action; making an Average (2 difficulty dice) Coercion check. For each success, one enemy within short range suffers one strain. The character can also spend Advantage; for every Advantage spent, one target already affected suffers 1 additional strain.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Scathing Tirade</name> <number>TAL0001215</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-14 12:39:39</sys_created_on> <sys_id>687ec4ee2f7f1490e0f497eef699b624</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-14 12:39:39</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
